name: Space Rage (GodzillaVr)
description:
In Space Rage you are flying your spaceship when all of the sudden you see hundreds of spaceships coming your way! Your ships sensors are broken and will blow up if a ship goes offscreen! Destroy as many spaceships as you can to rack up points and get a high score! But be careful, every time a ship comes the next one will come a little faster!

Controls: WASD to move

Space to fire

This is my first game in Godot so it might not be that good.
